context_bundle.summary: Package manager usage for software deployment across Windows (Chocolatey, winget, scoop), macOS (Homebrew), and Linux (apt, yum, dnf, pacman)

onboarding.quick_start: Install packages via choco install (Windows), brew install (macOS), or apt/yum install (Linux) with automation-friendly flags
common_patterns: Chocolatey: choco install git nodejs python -y (auto-confirm)
Homebrew: brew install --quiet nodejs python3 (suppress output)
Mass installation: Loop through package arrays in scripts
known_errors: Chocolatey -y handles prompts, but underlying installers must support silent mode
Homebrew NONINTERACTIVE=1 skips some prompts but may require sudo password
Package availability varies by platform and repository
